com.googlecode.cqengine.query.parser.cqn.support

Class DateMathParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.cqengine.query.parser.common.ValueParser<Date>
      • com.googlecode.cqengine.query.parser.cqn.support.DateMathParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateMathParser

    public class DateMathParser
extends ValueParser<Date>
    Parses date math expressions into Date objects, using ApacheSolrDataMathParser.

    Examples: 

       /HOUR
      ... Round to the start of the current hour
   /DAY
      ... Round to the start of the current day
   +2YEARS
      ... Exactly two years in the future from now
   -1DAY
      ... Exactly 1 day prior to now
   /DAY+6MONTHS+3DAYS
      ... 6 months and 3 days in the future from the start of
          the current day
   +6MONTHS+3DAYS/DAY
      ... 6 months and 3 days in the future from now, rounded
          down to nearest day
    See ApacheSolrDataMathParser for more details.
    Author:
    niall.gallagher
